column1: Worcester Walmart store ordered closed after 23 employees test positive for coronavirus
Sen. Lindsey Graham (R-SC) vowed that unemployment benefits won’t be extended by the Republican Senate majority no matter the status of the coronavirus pandemic.

YAY! Received the results of my #COVID19 (#coronavirus) test...NEGATIVE! I took the test to appease my mind after being in contact w/2 people who tested poz (one died). Hubby took test 2 and is negative. Feeling more relieved and calm.
Gov. DeSantis is manipulating coronavirus data and lying to the public while risking Floridians' health and safety. Floridians deserve the truth so that they can protect themselves.

"And at the end of the day, your feet should be dirty, your hair messy and your eyes sparkling." - Shanti How are your hair and feet at the end of the day?! #WednesdayWisdom #WednesdayThoughts #WednesdayVibes #IStayHome #StayHomeBeSafe #Covid19 #Coronavirus #MotivationEveryday
